home.TITLE: IdiomaAdivina
home.DESCRIPTION: "IdiomaAdivina" is the perfect app to learn languages in a fun and effective way. Choose your languages, play by guessing words, and expand your vocabulary. Personalize your experience, complete challenges, and connect with other students in a friendly community. Download "IdiomaAdivina" and start learning languages in an exciting way today.

play.SAME_LANG: You have chosen the same language! To play, please choose different languages.

WORD_MASTER.name: Word Master
WORD_MASTER.description: Guess the English word corresponding to the given word in Spanish.

LANGUINI_CHALLENGE.name: Linguini Challenge
LANGUINI_CHALLENGE.description: Become a polyglot chef by identifying ingredients in different languages.

SYNONYM_SHOWDOWN.name: Synonym Showdown
SYNONYM_SHOWDOWN.description: Find synonyms for the given words and expand your vocabulary.

VOCAB_RACER.name: Vocab Racer
VOCAB_RACER.description: Race against time to translate words in various languages.

LINGO_BINGO.name: Lingo Bingo
LINGO_BINGO.description: Mark the correct words on your bingo card as they are announced in another language.
